detectors.description:
HappyFarmToken._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint96,uint96) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HappyFarmToken.sol#486-497) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HappyFarmToken.sol#489)

detectors.description:
